Necromancer spins aroud when mobster pushes the tail away. He spreads 
his wings and swings them at Mobster. knowing that he's open for an 
attack he launches a series of six fireballs at the giant. starting 
with a shot at mobsters left arm he moves to the right shoulder and 
continues to alternate.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "SOULSTICE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> OOC: Just regular round lasers.
> 
> BIC: Mobster moves his hands up and catches the tail, pushing the 
tail, hopefully out of the way...
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: CYBERWOLF4 
>   To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
>   Sent: Sunday, January 07, 2001 11:00 AM
>   Subject: Re: Necromancer's fight with Mobster
> 
> 
>   (What did he fire?  Is he still using his flamethrower?)
>    
>   Necromancer continued to let his wings take the abuse, he rose 
his left wing up and blocked the shot. stress fractures continued to 
form as the abuse continued to take its tole. as he blocked he swung 
his tale around at Mobsters head. 
>     ----- Original Message ----- 
>     From: SOULSTICE 
>     To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
>     Sent: Saturday, January 06, 2001 3:39 PM
>     Subject: Necromancer's fight with Mobster
> 
> 
>     Mobster seen the ice blast coming, since this enemy has been 
firing them alot indeed. Mobster aimed Grenade's flamethrower, and 
managed to destroy the ice ball with it. Then the fireballs came. 
Mobster tried to switch to Kracken's ice gun, but too late, bang! 
Mobster slaps at himself to put the fire out. It does in fact, 
though, start to defrost his arm. Was he working on Gigas' brain? He 
must have been! He fired the flamethrower at his arm and melted the 
ice. He took the gun back in his left arm. Horn Drill had been known 
to be perfect at almost everything. Mobster aimed at Necromancer's 
head, and fired...
>       ----- Original Message ----- 
>       From: CYBERWOLF4 
>       To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
>       Sent: Saturday, January 06, 2001 11:24 AM
>       Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice
> 
> 
>       Necromacer curled his wings in front of him taking the brunt 
of Mobsters attack. small cracks began to form where the shots 
struck. He roared partly in intimidation and partly in disgust at the 
Alliance bot before him. he fired an ice blast from his mouth 
followed by a fireball out of each nostril.
> 
> 
>           eGroups Sponsor
